index_terms: CHICAGO MILWAUKEE ST PAUL PACIFIC RAILROAD
summary: An ordinance granting permission to the Northern Pacific Railway Company, et al., to remove a portion of the temporary overhead bridge upon and along a portion of Holgate Street, together with the easterly approach thereto and stairway on 1st Avenue South, constructed and maintained under the provisions of Ordinance No. 19765, and to construct a new approach to such temporary overhead bridge.
